bestRecipes.name: Pizza Margherita
bestRecipes.description: A classic Italian pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

bestRecipes.name: Sushi
bestRecipes.description: Vinegared rice combined with seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits.

bestRecipes.name: Tacos al Pastor
bestRecipes.description: Marinated pork cooked on a vertical spit, served in a tortilla with pineapple, cilantro, and onions.

bestRecipes.name: Croissant
bestRecipes.description: A buttery, flaky, and crescent-shaped pastry.

bestRecipes.name: Pad Thai
bestRecipes.description: Stir-fried rice noodle dish typically made with shrimp or chicken, peanuts, scrambled eggs, and bean sprouts.

bestRecipes.name: Peking Duck
bestRecipes.description: A famous Chinese dish featuring crispy-skinned roast duck served with pancakes, cucumber, and hoisin sauce.

bestRecipes.name: Butter Chicken
bestRecipes.description: Chicken cooked in a mildly spiced tomato sauce with butter and cream.

bestRecipes.name: Paella
bestRecipes.description: A traditional Spanish rice dish often made with seafood, chicken, and saffron.

bestRecipes.name: Pho
bestRecipes.description: A flavorful Vietnamese noodle soup with beef or chicken, herbs, and lime.

bestRecipes.name: Baklava
bestRecipes.description: A sweet pastry made of layers of filo dough filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with honey or syrup.

bestRecipes.name: Feijoada
bestRecipes.description: A hearty black bean stew with pork and beef, often served with rice and oranges.

bestRecipes.name: Beef Bourguignon
bestRecipes.description: A rich beef stew braised in red wine with onions, garlic, and mushrooms.

bestRecipes.name: Shakshuka
bestRecipes.description: Poached eggs in a sauce of tomatoes, chili peppers, and onions, spiced with cumin.

bestRecipes.name: Cheeseburger
bestRecipes.description: A grilled beef patty topped with cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles, typically served in a bun.

bestRecipes.name: Tom Yum Goong
bestRecipes.description: A hot and sour Thai soup usually cooked with shrimp, lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, galangal, lime juice, and fish sauce.

bestRecipes.name: Korean BBQ (Bulgogi)
bestRecipes.description: Thinly sliced marinated beef grilled and often served with lettuce wraps, rice, and a variety of side dishes.

bestRecipes.name: Biryani
bestRecipes.description: A mixed rice dish with spices, rice, and meat (chicken, beef, goat, pork, lamb, prawn, fish), or vegetables.

bestRecipes.name: Dim Sum
bestRecipes.description: A variety of small Chinese dishes typically served with tea, including dumplings, buns, and rolls.

bestRecipes.name: Tagine
bestRecipes.description: A slow-cooked stew braised at low temperatures, made with meat, vegetables, and a variety of spices.

bestRecipes.name: Moussaka
bestRecipes.description: A layered dish made with eggplant, minced meat, potatoes, and a creamy b√©chamel sauce.
